Text: Many thanks, Spetses, I was getting a bit worried that I wouldn't get my weekly dose of quality reading!

thorhammer2000 - I am really so busy at the moment I did forget,I will try for a regular Thursday spot from now on. Must dash the boys are playing those bloody Germans in Euro 2012.A win and the whole of Greece will go crazy,could it be Euro 2004 all over again.
